title: Drawing, "Mountain Lake [?]", 1873
signed: Signed with initials and dated in graphite, lower left: T. M. 1873.
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, lower left corner: Rio Virgen Canon/ T.M.  l873; and again at lower right: Spanish Bayonet/ young oak/ cactus/ Large Cottonwoods in Valley; color and drawing notations in graphite throughout.
description:
Recto: Horizontal view of rock formations seen across the valley and river.  Some plants are in the foreground. Many notations refer to the colors and to the kinds of formations.

Verso: Slightly sketched view of a mountain lake (?)

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Mountain Lake [?]", 1873.
1873. Graphite on tan wove paper.. Gift of Thomas Moran. 1917-17-22.
